extends Object

        protected String proto
        Protocol of URL object. The value is specified by <TestCaseName>.Protocol test property.

        Source directory of URL object (directory where the file specified by the URL object exist). The value is specified by <TestCaseName>.SrcDir test property.

        protected String fname
        Filename of URL object. The value is specified by <TestCaseName>.FileName test property.

      • port

        protected int port
        Port of URL object. The value is specified by <TestCaseName>.Port test property.

        protected String algorithm
        Message Digest Algorithm. The value is specified by <TestCaseName>.Algorithm test property.

        protected String expected
        Expected result (Message Digest as a String in hexadecimal format or Exception). The value is specified by <TestCaseName>.Expected test property.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TestItem

        public TestItem(String tcname)
         throws Exception
        Creating TestItem object (Constructor). Test parameters: ComputeDigest.testCases - Test Cases names <TestCaseName>.Protocol - protocol of URL object <TestCaseName>.FileName - filename of URL object <TestCaseName>.SrcDir - directory where the file specified by the URL object exist <TestCaseName>.Port - port number of URL object <TestCaseName>.Algorithm - message digest algorithm <TestCaseName>.Expected - expected result testClassServer.dir - HTTP Server source directory testClassServer.port - HTTP Server port number ComputeDigest.SecondHTTPServer.port - 2-nd HTTP Server port number ComputeDigest.SecondHTTPServer.dir - 2-nd HTTP Server source directory
        Parameters:
        tcname - Test Case name
        Throws:
        Exception - if any exception occured while TestItem object creation

                String proto,

        Creating TestItem object (Constructor).

        tcname - Test Case name
        proto - protocol
        port - port
        src - source directory
        fname - filename
        alg - message digest algorithm
        exp - expected result (Exception or null)

                  throws Exception

      • computeMessageDigest

        protected String computeMessageDigest(String src,
                                      String fn,
                                      String alg)
                               throws Exception
        Computing message digest for the file.
        Parameters:
        src - source directory
        fn - file name
        alg - message digest algorithm
        Returns:
        message digest in hexadecimal format or null if file doesn't exist
        Throws:
        Exception - if the message digest for the specified file can't be computed

      • compare

        public boolean compare(String test)
        Comparing 2 Message Digests. Comparing the Message Digest computed with HttpmdUtil.computeDigest(URL,String) method with the expected one.
        Parameters:
        test - the Message Digest value computed with HttpmdUtil.computeDigest(URL,String) method
        Returns:
        result of comparison (true or false)

      • compare

        public boolean compare(Exception test)
        Comparing 2 Exceptions. Comparing the Exception occurred while computing Message Digest with HttpmdUtil.computeDigest(URL,String) method with the expected one.
        Parameters:
        test - the Exception occurred while computing Message Digest with HttpmdUtil.computeDigest(URL,String) method
        Returns:
        result of comparison (true or false)
